page.title: 08Recreation and Spare Time
page.content: {Recreation and Spare Time.}Over 55% of people said they had some hobby. .Knitting for the women and sport for the men were the most popular. .Others mentioned were; singing,bingo,television.53% of the people thought that the recreational facilities were good in the area.38% said they used the S.T.A.R. Sports centre.20% used the centre once a week.10% used it twice a week and 8% used it more than three times a week. The most popular facility used in Splott was the Swimming pool,with the S.T.A.R.centre a close second. When asked if they would like a recreational facility that isn't here now the most popular answer was an ice skating rink and bowling alley.
